title: HCA Healthcare Shares Rise on Revenue Beat, Earnings Outlook
text:
By Dave Sebastian

Shares of HCA Healthcare Inc. (HCA) rose 3% in premarket trading Tuesday after the company beat third-quarter revenue estimates and nudged up the lower end of its earnings guidance.

Revenue for the third quarter rose to $12.69 billion from $11.45 billion a year ago. Analysts polled by FactSet were looking for $12.5 billion.

For the quarter ended Sept. 30, the health-care company reported net income of $612 million, or $1.76 a share, compared with $759 million, or $2.15 a share, in the prior year. Analysts were expecting $2.06 a share.

The company raised the lower end of its earnings guidance to between $10.30 a share and $10.65 a share for the year from between $10.25 a share and $10.65 a share. It backed its revenue outlook of $50.5 billion and $51.5 billion for the year.

Write to Dave Sebastian at dave.sebastian@wsj.com

(END) Dow Jones Newswires

October 29, 2019 09:40 ET (13:40 GMT)
